requirements.summary: Implement routing for all main and city-specific pages
acceptanceCriteria: All main navigation pages are routable
All four city pages have unique routes
Navigation links correctly route to their respective pages

file_operations.description: Create Services page displaying detailed information about all six irrigation services offered by R Irrigation. Include service descriptions, benefits, and CTA to contact or request estimate.

Create Service Areas page listing all towns served in Northern New Jersey, organized by county (Bergen County, Passaic County). Include links to city-specific pages for Clifton, Paramus, Wayne, and Hackensack.
Create Reviews page displaying an expanded collection of customer testimonials and reviews for R Irrigation services. Include customer names, service types, ratings, and detailed feedback.

Create Contact page featuring prominent display of phone number (973) 955-8340, email placeholder, service hours, and a detailed contact form for estimate requests with fields for name, phone, email, service type, and message. Use shadcn/ui form components.

Configure React Router to define routes for all pages: / (Home), /services (Services), /service-areas (ServiceAreas), /reviews (Reviews), /contact (Contact), /clifton-nj (CliftonNJ), /paramus-nj (ParamusNJ), /wayne-nj (WayneNJ), /hackensack-nj (HackensackNJ). Import all page components and set up route definitions. Ensure Header and Footer are rendered outside the router switch so they appear on all pages.

Update Header navigation links to use React Router Link components with correct paths: / for Home, /services for Services, /service-areas for Service Areas, /reviews for Reviews, /contact for Contact. Ensure links are properly styled and indicate active route.
